kDesc
You and your Sunrise RC Truck have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over Home![#Legal]
Grâce au lien fort qui s'est créé entre votre truck RC aurore et vous, il vous suivra partout dans Home ![#Legal]
Du hast eine starke Bindung zu deinem "Sonnenaufgang"-RC-Truck aufgebaut. Er folgt dir in Home überallhin![#Legal]
Tu e il tuo Camion RC Alba avete stretto un forte legame e da adesso ti seguirà per tutto Home![#Legal]
¡Tu camión de control remoto de amanecer y tú habéis desarrollado un fuerte vínculo y te seguirá por todo Home![#Legal]
*Not Localized* You and your Sunrise RC Truck have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over Home! [#Legal]
선라이즈 RC 트럭이 당신과 깊은 유대 관계를 형성했습니다. 이제 PlayStation®Home 어디든 당신을 따라 다닐 겁니다![#Legal]
You and your Sunrise RC Truck have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over Home![#Legal]
你和你的日出RC大貨車已經建立了深厚的感情。無論在PlayStation®Home的任何地方，它也會跟隨你！[#Legal]
